PicSomeweb app

ReactJS

GitHub Repo Live version

This is the basics of an e-commerce site that allows users to favorite photos and add them to cart. It is built using advance ReactJS techniques such as hooks and context. The homepage utilizes vanilla javascript as well as CSS Grid for the layout. It was built as the final project of Scrimba's Frontend Developer Career Path.

This project focuses heavily on using context to keep most of the logic seperate from the JSX components. I deviated from the older version of react-router-dom and spent time studying the up to date version for building routes for the pages.

Working on this has motivated me to want to continue my education into authentication and localStorage so that I could build onto this with logins and holding favorites of a user for when they return.

rawledjuglal@gmail.com
